quips.text:
'Sir, I would never look through your stuff!', Lovkiy replies.
'That was not my question!' you think out loud.
'I don't think we should be talking about this, Sir!'

'Fine, I will tell you! I was not supposed to, but we are all alone now, aren't we?,
Lovkiy replies angrily. 'It has to do with the experiment.'
